pkgmetadata.longdescription: R-Client for Interacting with the 'UCSF Data Library' // A client for interacting with 'magma', the data warehouse of the 'UCSF Data Library'. 'magmaR' includes functions for querying and downloading data from 'magma', in order to enable working with such data in R, as well as for uploading local data to 'magma'.
